issue.title: allow for command-line arguments to system plugins

content.html:
Can you try the following patch?

diff -r f84416d005a2 gazebo/gui/GuiIface.cc
--- a/gazebo/gui/GuiIface.cc    Thu Jul 24 10:38:24 2014 -0700
+++ b/gazebo/gui/GuiIface.cc    Mon Jul 28 12:55:33 2014 -0700
@@ -249,7 +249,7 @@
   if (!parse_args(_argc, _argv))
     return false;

-  if (!gazebo::setupClient())
+  if (!gazebo::setupClient(_argc, _argv))
     return false;

   if (!gazebo::gui::load())

UPDATE: branch issue_280_client (c908df855b81)

@ahaidu Let me know if that patch works.
